name: Advanced 2D Character Controller
description:
This asset pack contains -
A character controller wich allows the player to move left and right and can jump. there is also a dash ability included. after you hit the ground there is a dust effect. this charcater controller also has a wall jumping ability.
there is an included jump sound effect too alongside a dash particle effect.

There is a camera follow script attached to the camera with the ability to add offset to it.

A UI timer which displays how long the player has been in the level for in seconds.

There is a basic gameover screen for when the player gets hurt that can easily be expanded on. and a try again button that will reload the scene.

there is a jumpad included which bounces the player into the air.
there is a sound efefct for when the player touches the jump pad.

there is a ground spike trap that kills the player and displays the game over scr4een when you hit it.

there is a falling spike trap that when the player gets near it the spikes will fall from the ceiling.

there is a saw trap that kills the player and displays the gamer over screen when you touch it.

there is a rotating blade that spins and kills the player when you touch it.

there are 3 eneimes included in the pack:
a patrol emeine that moves across the platforms and kills the player if you touch it.
a enemy that when you get in range will chase you and try and kill you unitl you get out of range.
a flying enemy that bounces off walls and the floors and ceilings that can be coded to kill the player.
